price: Ancak tevbe eden, iman eden ve iyi davranışta bulunan kimseler hariçtir. Bunlar, hiçbir haksızlığa uğratılmaksızın cennete,
arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
